JobTitle: Member Growth Manager - Global Nike Direct Digital Commerce
JobFullDesc:
The Member Growth Team is at the forefront of Nike’s next phase of growth, by creating and delivering compelling reasons for our consumers to connect, engage and transact directly with Nike through the Nike Membership program. We seek to know, create, serve, and retain Members across the One Nike Marketplace inclusive of direct channels and strategic partners! This Manager will be part of the team responsible for evolving the Program to better acquire consumers, serve Members, and drive Nike, Inc. growth. They will serve and retain members throughout their journey with Nike through developing compelling benefits and journeys that enable personalized, relevant and responsive ways to deepen their relationship with Nike and make sport a daily habit across One Nike Marketplace.

WHO WE ARE LOOKING FOR

As we accelerate our offense, we need a Member Growth Manager to join our Global Team. This person is a motivated strategic problem solver with a proven track record of working within a sophisticated and sometimes ambiguous environment to create bold visions and successful strategically led frameworks informed by data that are well understood by all. This person has expertise in setting business critical metrics, loyalty and membership, experience in retail/ecommerce, strategy, and a passion for great customer experiences! We need someone who has a track record of influencing high-caliber teams in fast paced and complex environments, and a desire to be at the center of a massive transformation of Nike’s digital and direct capabilities. We are also looking for someone who has an understanding of behavioral economics, consumer psychology, and the current and emerging landscape of membership. Experience driving ubiquitous programs that operate at scale will also be important to this role. Having an understanding of digital product capabilities needed to enable Member Growth is key.

WHAT YOU WILL WORK ON

You will create and evolve the overall Member Growth strategy and how we activate against it to serve Members globally. This includes optimizing the benefits portfolio, developing strategies to manage the Member Lifecycle, establishing capability investment roadmaps to activate the offense, developing Member Growth plans, and expanding the proposition to serve Members across One Nike Marketplace.

WHO YOU WILL WORK WITH

You will be part of the Global Member Growth team and will lead a cross-functional offense with partners across Membership, Marketing, Digital Product, Technology, Finance, Stores, Analytics, Consumer Creation, and our four Geographies to drive a truly global, enterprise transformation of how we serve Members across the digital and physical One Nike Marketplace.
